verbs.description: [ARG0: The Trump administration] [V: wants] [ARG1: more migrants fleeing their home countries to seek asylum in Mexico instead of coming to the U.S. border to ask for help] .
The Trump administration wants [ARG0: more migrants] [V: fleeing] [ARG1: their home countries] to seek asylum in Mexico instead of coming to the U.S. border to ask for help .
The Trump administration wants [ARG0: more migrants fleeing their home countries] to [V: seek] [ARG1: asylum] [ARGM-LOC: in Mexico] [ARGM-ADV: instead of coming to the U.S. border to ask for help] .
The Trump administration wants [ARG1: more migrants fleeing their home countries] to seek asylum in Mexico instead of [V: coming] [ARG4: to the U.S. border] [ARGM-PRP: to ask for help] .
The Trump administration wants [ARG0: more migrants fleeing their home countries] to seek asylum in Mexico instead of coming to the U.S. border to [V: ask] [ARG1: for help] .
